fr.liglab.adele.icasa.location

Interface LocatedObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LocatedDevice, Zone

    public interface LocatedObject
    This interface represents a object that can be placed using a point into a coordinate system.
    Author:
    Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attachObject(LocatedObject object)
      Attaches other object to this one.
      void detachObject(LocatedObject object)
      Detaches the object from this one.
      Position getCenterAbsolutePosition()
      Gets the absolute (x,y) point of the object.
      void setCenterAbsolutePosition(Position position)
      Sets the absolute (x,y) point of the object.

    • Method Detail

      • getCenterAbsolutePosition

        Position getCenterAbsolutePosition()
        Gets the absolute (x,y) point of the object.
        Returns:
        The absolute (x,y) point of the object.

      • setCenterAbsolutePosition

        void setCenterAbsolutePosition(Position position)
        Sets the absolute (x,y) point of the object.
        Parameters:
        position - the new position

      • attachObject

        void attachObject(LocatedObject object)
        Attaches other object to this one. Both objects are moved at same time.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to be attached.

      • detachObject

        void detachObject(LocatedObject object)
        Detaches the object from this one.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to be detached.
